name: The Obsidian Trial
description: An ancient testing ground carved from volcanic rock. The air is hot and smells of sulfur.

entrance.name: Trial Entrance
entrance.description: You stand at the entrance of a foreboding structure. To the south, a lava tube leads back to the caves. To the north, a grand hallway beckons.

hall_of_gates.name: Hall of Gates
hall_of_gates.description: A wide hallway blocked by a Massive Obsidian Gate to the north. Passages branch off to the east and west.

lever_room_west.name: West Mechanism Room
lever_room_west.description: A small chamber containing a mechanism.

lever_room_east.name: East Mechanism Room
lever_room_east.description: A small chamber containing a mechanism. It seems broken or jammed (Dummy for now, or just flavor).

inner_sanctum.name: Inner Sanctum
inner_sanctum.description: A massive circular chamber. In the center stands a construct of living stone.
